thread.title: Sources: 76ers trade Ersan Ilyasova to Hawks
thread.title_full: Sources: 76ers trade Ersan Ilyasova to Hawks

author: Yahoo Sports
title: Sources: 76ers trade Ersan Ilyasova to Hawks
text:
Ersan Ilyasova played 53 games for the 76ers. (AP) More As Atlanta Hawks general manager Wes Wilcox promised, the franchise has turned into a trade-deadline buyer.
The Hawks completed a trade with the Philadelphia 76ers on Wednesday to acquire forward Ersan Ilyasova.
The Hawks sent center Tiago Splitter and a 2017 second-round draft pick via the Miami Heat to the Sixers.
The Hawks and Sixers also agreed on a swap of 2017 second-round picks, which ultimately will become the Golden State Warriorsâ€™ second-round pick headed to Atlanta.
Philadelphia has continued discussions on trading center Jahlil Okafor , league sources told The Vertical. Talks with the Chicago Bulls were continuing Wednesday night, with the Bulls working to persuade the 76ers to accept forward Nikola Mirotic as part of a trade package, league sources said.
Ilyasova has played for five teams since the summer of 2015 and has been included in four trades. Ilyasova gives Atlanta a sharpshooting power forward who has averaged 14.8 points on 44 percent shooting for the Sixers this season.
The Hawks are 32-24, holding onto fourth place in the Eastern Conference standings .
The Sixers plan to use Splitter, 32, as a mentor for their young centers the rest of the season.
